question: Which of the following organelle is NOT part of an animal cell?
Which answer gives the correct functions of both the cytoplasm AND the cell membrane?

answers.a: The Cytoplasm is the place where cell reactions take place. ‎ ‎ ‎The cell membrane controls what goes in and out of a cell
answers.b: The Cytoplasm controls cell division ‎ ‎ ‎ The cell membrane gives support to the cell
answers.c: The Cytoplasm gives support to the cell ‎ ‎  ‎ The cell membrane place where cell reactions take place
answers.d: The Cytoplasm controls cell division ‎ ‎  ‎ The cell membrane controls what goes in and out of a cell

question: Which of these units is most suitable for measuring the length of a cell?
Which of these cellular structures contain DNA?
All of the following organelle interact with ribosomes except...
What are ribosomes made up of?
Which of the following statements are true?
Is the Golgi stack the same as the Golgi cisternae?
Which organelle handles shipping and distributing of protiens and chemicals produced by the cell?
The region around the Golgi apparatus where other organelles are absent is called?

answers.a: Lysosomes - involved in synthesizing amino acids
answers.b: Endoplasmic reticulum - plays a role in synthesising protiens and lipids
